TITLE.P: EVOLUTION OF FLIGHT DYNAMICS MONITORING AND COMMAND SOFTWARE FOR COP SENTINELS C/D MODELS

SHORT_DESCR.P: The objective of this activity is to evolve and adapt the Attitude Monitoring and Command Generation subsystems of the Flight Dynamics System used at ESOC by the Copernicus missions to take advantage of the progress on the ESOC internal infrastructure. The purpose is to align the mentioned subsystems with the orbit determination and manoeuvre optimisation subsystem, which are based on the GENEOS infrastructure which in turn is based on GODOT, favouring the coherency of the system and facilitating the usage for the different team members.

The Evolution of Flight Dynamics Monitoring and Command software for COP Sentinels C/D models will be funded by the EU Copernicus Programme and will therefore be open exclusively to economic operators that have their registered office in an EU Member State or a State participating in the EU Copernicus Programme.

The Invitation to Tender (ITT) will be published on esa-star Publication. In order to access the ITT Package from esa-star Publication, Tenderers must be registered in esa-star as potential ESA suppliers. Any Tenderer which is not yet registered with ESA as a potential supplier must complete the online questionnaire in esa-star Registration, https://esastar-emr.sso.esa.int/ . Further information on the registration process can be found in ESA’s INDUSTRY PORTAL available at: - http://www.esa.int/About_Us/Business_with_ESA/esa-star_open_for_business

Please note that esa-star allows two levels of entity registration: “Light” and “Full”. This allows new users wishing to do business with ESA to carry out their registration in two steps. While “Light” registration will grant access to all esa-star services up to and including proposal submission, the award of ESA contracts requires “Full” registration.
